00295 /* Plugin include? */
00296 #if defined(__orxPLUGIN__)
00297 
00298   #ifdef __orxEMBEDDED__
00299 
00300     #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT /* Compiling embedded plug-in => API doesn't need to be imported */
00301 
00302   #else
00303 
00304     #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT orxDLLIMPORT /* Compiling plug-in => API needs to be imported */
00305 
00306   #endif /* __orxEMBEDDED__ */
00307 
00308 /* External include? */
00309 #elif defined(__orxEXTERN__)
00310 
00311   #ifdef __orxSTATIC__
00312 
00313     #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT /* Linking executable against orx static library */
00314 
00315   #else /* __orxSTATIC__ */
00316 
00317     #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT orxDLLIMPORT /* Linking executable against orx dynamic library */
00318 
00319   #endif /* __orxSTATIC__ */
00320 
00321 /* Internal (library) include */
00322 #else
00323 
00324   #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT orxDLLEXPORT /* Compiling orx library => API needs to be exported */
00325 
00326 #endif

00330 #define orxALIGN(ADDRESS, BLOCK_SIZE)   (((ADDRESS) + ((BLOCK_SIZE) - 1)) & (~((BLOCK_SIZE) - 1)))
00331 
00332 #define orxALIGN16(ADDRESS)             orxALIGN(ADDRESS, 16)
00333 #define orxALIGN32(ADDRESS)             orxALIGN(ADDRESS, 32)
00334 #define orxALIGN64(ADDRESS)             orxALIGN(ADDRESS, 64)
00335

00337 /* Padding macro */
00338 #ifdef __orxPADDING__
00339 
00340   #ifdef orxPADDING_SIZE                /* Padding size defined */
00341 
00342     #define orxPAD(SIZE)                orxU8 au8Pad[orxALIGN(SIZE, orxPADDING_SIZE) - SIZE];
00343 
00344   #else /* orxPADDING_SIZE */           /* Padding size not defined */
00345 
00346     #define orxPAD(SIZE)                /* No padding applied */
00347 
00348     #warning orxPADDING_SIZE is undefined : its value should be a power of 2!
00349     #undef __orxPADDING__
00350 
00351   #endif /* orxPADDING_SIZE */
00352 
00353 #else /* __orxPADDING__ */
00354 
00355   #define orxPAD(SIZE)                  /* No padding applied */
00356 
00357 #endif /* __orxPADDING__ */

00365 #define orxFLAG_TEST_ALL(X, F) (((X) & (F)) == (F))
00366 
00372 #define orxFLAG_TEST(X, F) (((X) & (F)) != 0)
00373 
00379 #define orxFLAG_GET(X, M) ((X) & (M))
00380 
00386 #define orxFLAG_SET(X, A, R)  \
00387 do                            \
00388 {                             \
00389   (X) &= ~(R);                \
00390   (X) |= (A);                 \
00391 } while(orxFALSE)
00392 
00397 #define orxFLAG_SWAP(X, S) ((X) ^= (S))
